title: Cow variant database portal
description: A comprehensive information of xxxxxx single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) and yyyyyyy insertions/deletions (INDELs) identified from sequencing data of zzzzz cow accessions.
long_description: The Cow Database aims to create an interactive resource to archive and display genomic variation in cow breeds (e.g., Chianina, Marchigiana, etc.). The database currently contains pre-assembled Whole-Exome Sequencing data from NGS illumina library of 34 samples within 8 breeds.
